blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
So, I've had some problems with the game and I had to restart it all over! 😭
The old game is saved, but I haven't been able to...
body:
So, I’ve had some problems with the game and I had to restart it all over! 😭

The old game is saved, but I haven’t been able to get back at it so far, so I decided to start over and have some fun as a first year once again.

Meet Demetra Kowalski, and next to her is her wand which I remembered to screenshot. I regret not screenshotting Carina’s so much.

My attributes are at level one, my energy has 24 slots, it feels so weird guys.

Well, hoping the problems don’t come back, and waiting for Carina to resurrect, I’ll update you on how Demetra is doing.

blog.name: ultrapixelturtle
blog.title: Pixel Turtle
blog.description:
Bored person who loves TMNT. Like a lot.
Wanna talk go ahead, I don't bite. Unless you want me to?

title: Get To Know The Blogger
body:
I’m bored. Send some questions my way. They’re mostly fandom related.
More personal questions will be lower down on the list.

1. Your current OTP

2. What was the first thing you contributed to a fandom?

3. What was your first fandom?

4. Live action TV shows, or animated ones?

5. Has a fandom caused you to shy away from a show, game etc?

6. How do you feel about other people in the fandoms you’re currently in?

7. Has someone gotten you into a fandom? If so, which one?

8. Favourite fandom (regarding the people and not the thing you obesess over)?

9. A headcanon you have?

10. Favourite male/male ship?

11. Favourite female/female ship?

12. 5 favourite characters from 5 different fandoms

13. What’s your patronus?

14. What Hogwarts house are you in?

15. What Ilvermorny house are you in?

16. If you could visit ONE fictional world, which one would it be?

17. Favourite movie?

18. Favourite book?

19. Favourite TV show?

20. Favourite anime?

21. What kind of music do you like?

22. Are you named after anyone?

23. Where are you from?

24. Favourite things about yourself?

25. Biggest fear?

26. What’s the most important thing in your life?

27. What do you do in your spare time?

28. Favourite Tv show as a child?

29. Dogs or cats?

30. Scariest thing that ever happened to you?

31. Any pets?

32. A book that made an impact on you?

33. A movie that made an impact on you?

34. How many languages do you speak?

35. Sexual orientation?

36. Gender identification?

summary: "When people try to give me compliments, I feel like a vending machine trying to accept a wrinkly dollar and it's extremely...
body:
“When people try to give me compliments, I feel like a vending machine trying to accept a wrinkly dollar and it’s extremely frustrating for everyone involved.”

-Slytherin

tags: my teammate used sherlock as an example
but i couldn't since i haven't watched it
summary: OKAY SO Y'ALL LISTEN. I HAD MY DEBATE FINALS TODAY AND MY TOPIC WAS 'EVIL IS MORE ATTRACTIVE THAN GOOD' AND I WAS SPEAKING FOR...
body:
OKAY SO Y'ALL LISTEN. I HAD MY DEBATE FINALS TODAY AND MY TOPIC WAS ‘EVIL IS MORE ATTRACTIVE THAN GOOD’ AND I WAS SPEAKING FOR THE MOTION. AND I USED FANDOM REFERENCES TO PROVE MY POINT!!!!!!!!!!

1

me:WE LOVE LOKI AS MUCH AS WE LOVE THOR, PROBABLY MORE AND EVERYONE CRIED WHEN HE DIED IN IW

Opposition:We don’t think anyone loves Loki,conduct a survey if you want-

my teammate:in such a tiny audience, siriously?

2

me: WE LOVE ANTAGONISTS MORE BECAUSE THEY SEEM MORE REAL,WHEREAS THE HEROES AFE JUST FLAWLESS AND PERFECT. AND WE ALL KNOW PERFECTION IS A FEAT THAT CANNOT BE ACHIEVED IN REAL LIFE

opposition:Harry Potter was different from voldemort,he was not flawless but he was different. Good is boring,your team mate said. Thoughts?

me:HARRY POTTER WAS NOT DIFFERENT FROM VOLDEMORT, RATHER VOLDEMORT WAS DIFFERENT FROM HARRY POTTER. DUMBLEDORE TAUGHT HARRY TO BE GOOD AND SELF- LESS, NOBODY TAUGHT VOLDEMORT TO BE BAD.HENCE HE WAS DIFFERENT AND IT WAS AFTERALL HIS SAYING “THERE’S NO GOOD OR EVIL,ONLY POWER AND THOSE TOO WEAK TO SEAK IT”

And when I was done one of the judges started clapping and she is Vice Principal and then evERYBODY ELSE WAS CLAPPING TOO AND I JUST….I JUST MADE THEM BELIEVE IN THE POWER OF FANDOMS!!!!!!!!

Oh and I also became BEST EMERGING DEBATER.

blog.title: caandle

hi! this is my fanfic blog! I mostly write NALU & occasionally Klance.

        Archive of Our Own
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
not a good look on you, Hermione
by caandle (aka me) 

Summary:

When Ron accidentally breaks Hermione’s heart, she starts making a lot of mistakes. Almost losing her job and getting embarrassingly plastered on Christmas night are just the first of many.

Draco Malfoy, however, turns out not to be one.

Rating: Mature/May be changed

Pairing: Hermione Granger/Draco Malfoy

Status: Ongoing! (2/10 chapters out so far!)

Warnings: Not really any as of yet, its mostly light-heartened so far. May be changed..

Side note: This is the first story I’ve been able to properly write for months now, since I’ve been struck by the oppressive weight that is writer’s block.  It would mean the world to me if you’d check it out! :)

also I’m actually rather proud of it but I desperately want constructive criticism n if you’d read it I would be over the moon

blog.name: ao3feed-jily
blog.title: ao3 feed of jily fanfics
blog.description:
Heya! This is an account that automatically posts new James/Lily fanfics!
icon made by @willhsrondale on twitter

title: Winter time
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wp32om

by Chainmaildragon

They were supposed to take full advantage of a free afternoon. But when harmless splashing in the prefects bathroom takes a turn for the worse, James needs his friends more than ever. And when did Evans start talking to him?

Words: 2138, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: James Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Lily Evans Potter
  • Relationships: James Potter/Lily Evans Potter
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wp32om
